TEXT.TITLE: NEW JERSEY HOSPITAL ASSOCIATION SYMPOSIUM
TEXT.BODY:
The New Jersey Hospital Association said it will hold a symposium on the quality of hospital care on Friday, April 10. Thirty-eight health-care executives from 18 nations will be on hand at the symposium.
Reuter
